p.i: A tiny cube with paintings of goblins on each face, each one depicting transcendence in a physical or mental trait.

description.p: Benefit. Roll the cube by rolling a d6. Your corresponding stat permanently increases to 18 (+4). 1. Strength. 2. Dexterity. 3. Constitution. 4. Intelligence. 5. Wisdom. 6. Charisma. After being rolled, Brak's Cube of Perfection teleports to a random location in the multiverse.
